body_html:
@peterjc123 Thank you!

I can confirm that using your latest instructions I am able to build the master branch on Windows with CUDA 8.0. Many thanks on all of your amazing and super hard work in porting pytorch for windows! Very much appreciate it!

body:
@peterjc123 Thank you!

I can confirm that using your latest instructions I am able to build the master branch on Windows with CUDA 8.0. Many thanks on all of your amazing and super hard work in porting pytorch for windows! Very much appreciate it!
